title: [Item Concept] 120 AP Item - Aether Wisp  + Needlessly Large Rod = Celestial Wand
body:
This is my idea to fulfil the 120 Ap item slot. It is a simple item to fulfil the gap DFG left.

Clestial Wand
Aether Wisp 850g + Needlessly Large Rod 1600g = Celestial Wand 3300 Gold cost

750 combine cost

120 AP

5% move speed

Unique Passive - Rage : Spells grant 20 ms on hit for 2 seconds (this is reduced by 33% for aoe and non single target spells, Dots do not proc it) Minion, monster, and champion kills grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds

You could add 10 cd if you wanted to aswell.

replies.body: nice i like it, but the cd and movement speed seem a bit much, maybe if you made the 120 ap and 15 cd and then that Unique passive :D would suit it, but even if you kept it like it is now its alright, might not be able to replace the all mighty DFG {{summoner:30}}  but its something rather then something. good job :D

lose the MS on upgrade from the base items?

simple fix: keep it as is, 100 AP instead of 120.

bam, assassin AP item.
